Class NeonClientJNI

java.lang.Object
com.quietterminal.projectneon.jni.NeonClientJNI
public class NeonClientJNI extends Object
JNI wrapper for NeonClient to enable C/C++ integration. This class provides native methods that can be called from C/C++ code for game engine integration (Unreal, Unity, custom engines).

    • neonClientNew

      public static long neonClientNew(String name)
      Creates a new NeonClient instance.
      Parameters:
      name - Player name
      Returns:
      Pointer to NeonClient (as long) or 0 on error

    • neonClientConnect

      public static boolean neonClientConnect(long clientPtr, int sessionId, String relayAddr)
      Connects to a relay server.
      Parameters:
      clientPtr - Pointer to NeonClient
      sessionId - Session ID to join
      relayAddr - Relay address (host:port)
      Returns:
      true if connected, false otherwise

    • neonClientProcessPackets

      public static int neonClientProcessPackets(long clientPtr)
      Processes incoming packets.
      Parameters:
      clientPtr - Pointer to NeonClient
      Returns:
      Number of packets processed, or -1 on error

    • neonClientGetId

      public static int neonClientGetId(long clientPtr)

      Parameters:
      clientPtr - Pointer to NeonClient
      Returns:
      Client ID, or -1 if not connected

      public static void neonClientSetAutoPing(long clientPtr, boolean enabled)

      Parameters:
      clientPtr - Pointer to NeonClient
      enabled - true to enable, false to disable
